decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - This consent does not permit the demolition or dismantling of any part of the building, or the removal of any internal/external feature, floor, wall or ceiling surface, except in so far as the alterations hereby approved necessitate the removal of certain parts of the existing structure as specifically shown on the approved drawings
Condition : 4 - The timber framed casements shall be painted and maintained as white.
Condition : 5 - The thickness of the two glass panes and air gap shall not exceed 16mm.
description: Replacement of front ground and first floor bay windows and front first floor single sash windows with double glazed windows.
